column2: He checked his watch: six minutes past two. He closed the bedroom door and walked slowly downstairs. He opened the front door to see his car parked by the curb.
And the time was six minutes past two. And what of Jonah? He and Harry would probably arrive about five minutes too late.
The middle of the night? Alec asked sharply. "Can you be more definite?" "About two. Just past." Daisy noted that he expressed no concern for her safety.
